markdown.markdown: ```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, out.width="15%", out.height="15%",include=F} knitr::include_graphics("headshot1.jpg") ``` ## About Me I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics at Iowa State University. I previously studied Statistics at the University of Iowa (BS '18, MS '19). I then worked for a few years as a Biostatistician at the Center for International Blood and Marrow Transplant Research (CIBMTR) at the Medical College of Wisconsin. My research interests include Bayesian statistics, probability, and statistical computing and graphics. ## External Links [Iowa State University Stat Dept](https://www.stat.iastate.edu/) [University of Iowa Stat and Ac Sci Dept](https://stat.uiowa.edu/) [CIBMTR](https://www.cibmtr.org/Pages/index.aspx)
